          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth's Destiny</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schicksal Der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Destin de la Terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Destiny Da Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Destino Della Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινο πεπρωμένο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Destino De la Tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">What will happen to Planet Earth in a few billion years?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was geschieht Planet Masse in einigen Milliarde 
Jahren?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qu'arrivera à la terre de planète en quelques 
milliard d'années ?</string>
          </description>

bilhão anos?</string>
          </description>
          <description>

alcuni miliardo anni?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι θα συμβεί στον πλανήτη να επιχωματώσει σε μερικά 
δισεκατομμύριο έτη;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué sucederá a la tierra del planeta en algunos
mil millones años?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
